content: I'll hold onto it for now. I've been enjoying playing it on my record player, and it's a great addition to my collection. Speaking of collections, I've also inherited my great-aunt's vintage brooch collection, which includes a rare 1920s Art Deco piece featuring a large emerald. I've been learning about the history of brooches and their various styles, and I'm considering getting it appraised to determine its value. Can you help me with that?
